projects.title: Inventory Asset Manager
projects.description: Create an inventory asset manager in base python.  The code utilizes a database and application .py file to run a primary menu loop and formats the output in a readable fashion.

projects.title: Analysis of Winter Olympics Participation between 1924 and 2018
projects.description: Measure the growth of the Winter Olympic games between the years 1924 and 2018 across multiple sets of statistics, including participants, events, countries and population samples.

projects.title: Vehicle Fleet Database
projects.description: Create a database that tracks vehicle status, history and maintenance information for a manager of a small vehicle fleet for a local municipality.

projects.title: Detail Design for the BestPurchase App
projects.description: How do the elements of an activity diagram for a method within the BestPurchase app map one-to-one with lines in its pseudocode?  How does the creation of various forms of design diagrams iteratively add to the understanding of what is needed in a class model?  This report reviews the final steps considered to move the system design of the BestPurchase app towards implementation.

projects.title: Predicting Broadband Availability of My Local County
projects.description: Create models that identify correlations between geographical census metrics and predict the availability of broadband services (metrics include income, health insurance percentage, poverty level, unemployment, etc).
